attributes.action: The public of the United Kingdom demand that the government use their authority to ensure that Top Gun is shown in IMAX theatres in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Top Gun is currently being shown in IMAX theatres around the world, including the USA and Australia. There is currently no concrete plan to show this glorious film in the UK.

There are people alive in the United Kingdom right now who have not had the pleasure of watching this defining moment in 80's film history. What greater way to introduce them to double backward high fives, whooping and shouting of 'JESTER'S DEAD!' than in glorious 3D on a face meltingly large screen.

I implore you to sign this petition and show that, even in this double (triple?) dip recession the British public can still show their love of half naked men who are pretty awesome at flying massive jet aircraft and shooting down those generic communist types.

We need this.
